sentences: Ta tegi k천ik nendel, mida ta 천nnitses.
Need vabadused on garanteeritud meie kodanikele nendel p천hivabadustel p천hinedvalt konstruktil.
Loomulikult ei pruugi see olla lihtne, kuid see on asjakohane nendel juhtudel.
context: 'nendel' is the locative plural form of 'see', which means 'this'. It refers to objects that are near both the speaker and listener in location or time.
